name: CORE BREACH
effects: You cannot cool or lose heat
Make an overheating check each time you take heat

name: CRITICAL
effects: You cannot gain HP or repair
Make a structure check each time you take damage

name: Engaged
effects: While Engaged, all your ranged attacks are made with +1 Difficulty
If you become engaged with a target the same size or larger, you immediately stop moving and lose any unspent movement from that move.

name: Hidden
effects: You cannot be targeted by hostile attacks or actions, and enemies only know your approximate location. Performing any attack, forcing a saving throw, taking reactions, or ending your turn out of cover will lose hidden. Characters can find you by taking the search action and winning a contested check.

name: Immobilized
effects: Your maximum speed becomes 0. You cannot move or boost.

name: Impaired
effects: +1 Difficulty on all attacks, saves, and skill checks

name: Invisible
effects: All attacks against an invisible target have a 50% chance to miss outright (check before the attack roll).

name: Jammed
effects: The only attacks a Jammed mech can make are improvised attacks, grapples, or rams
A Jammed mech cannot use comms to talk to other players (can only talk to GM)
A Jammed mech cannot make or benefit from Tech actions
A Jammed mech cannot take reactions

name: Lock On
effects: An attacker can consume the Lock On status on a target to gain +1 Accuracy on its next attack against that target. Lock On may also activate other talents or abilities.

name: Shut Down
effects: Your mech is stunned, but you can still take the Boot Up action
Your mechâ€™s evasion becomes 5
Your mech cools
You cannot be affected by tech actions or system attacks or effects
Shutting down (or being shut down) re-shackles any unshackled AI.

name: Shredded
effects: A shredded mech cannot benefit from armor or resistance

name: Slowed
effects: Your maximum speed becomes 2 (after all modifiers)
You cannot boost

name: Stunned
effects: You cannot overcharge, take free actions, reactions, move, or take any actions with your mech. A pilot in a stunned mech can still mount or dismount their mech, eject, or take actions normally.
Attackers receive +1 Accuracy to attack you
You automatically fail all hull or agility saves

name: Prone
effects: Attackers receive +1 Accuracy to attack prone targets
A mech knocked prone is Slowed while prone but can still move. A prone mech can stand up as its regular movement. A mech cannot stand up while immobilized.
